scripts.parse: node build/index.js && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const copyDir = (src, dest) => { if (!fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.mkdirSync(dest, { recursive: true }); const entries = fs.readdirSync(src, { withFileTypes: true }); for (const entry of entries) { const srcPath = path.join(src, entry.name); const destPath = path.join(dest, entry.name); if (entry.isDirectory()) { copyDir(srcPath, destPath); } else { fs.copyFileSync(srcPath, destPath); } } }; copyDir('./output', '../web/public');"
